title: Pharmacy Tech Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at LTC
Interview Descriptions: Interview process was fair and reasonable. They tested my knowledge on brand and generic medication names. They asked about situations related to conflicts that might occur or common mistakes and how it might be handled.
Interview Questions: Tell me about a time you made a mistake and how did you resolve it.

title: Account Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at LTC (Mumbai) in Jan 2019
Interview Descriptions:
Good easy 3 steps
All years should be passed
No kt accepted
No backlog accepted
Gives good offer with retention money which is the main game.
All experience letters from past employers necessary.

Many branches under one category
Interview Questions: Based on past experience of yours.
